data.title: Cold Water Army
data.meta_description:
Cold Water Army by GHOSTxSHIP, released 08 July 2014

STRAIGHT EDGE IS NOT A PASSING PHASE
WE CHAMPION ITS VIRTUES EACH AND EVERY DAY
ITS ALWAYS STOOD FOR POSITIVE CHANGE
THE DRUG FREE LIFESTYLE IS HERE TO STAY

“SO HERE WE PLEDGE. PERPETUAL HATE,  TO ALL THAT CAN, INTOXICATE”

STRAIGHT EDGE IS NOT A PASSING TREND
THE VIOLENCE AND HATE MUST COME TO AN END
WE MUST PROGRESS PURIFY WITHIN
STAND AS ONE WITH PURPOSE AGAIN

“SO HERE WE PLEDGE. PERPETUAL HATE,  TO ALL THAT CAN, INTOXICATE”

THIS IS MY PROMISE TO MYSELF
THIS IS MY SOLEMN VOW

(feat. Ryan Wieser)
SOLDIERS OF THE COLD WATER ARMY
MARCH TOGETHER SIDE BY SIDE
WITH AN OATH OF PRIDE AND RESPECT
WE SPREAD OUR MESSAGE WORLD WIDE
WE COME TOGETHER IN TIMES OF NEED
COMMITTED FOREVER WE’LL ALWAYS BE
A BETTER PATH FOR YOU AND ME
COMMITTED TO LIVE LIFE DRUG FREE

THIS IS MY PROMISE TO MYSELF
THIS IS MY SOLEMN VOW

I CARVE THIS X INTO MY HEART
data.text: “What’s new is old, and what’s old is new again.” A quote from 17th century author Johnathan Swift—while used and paraphrased abundantly, especially in today’s age of retro-fitting and nostalgia—could not fit better for GhostxShip. A stalwart of the late-2000s east coast hardcore scene, the band are back after a decade-long hiatus with some of their most aggressive and energetic music to date. ... more
